pageContext.claim: “We have cleared the way for the construction of the Keystone and Dakota Access Pipelines — thereby creating tens of thousands of jobs — and I’ve issued a new directive that new American pipelines be made with American steel.”
pageContext.analysis: Trump appears to be combining two disputed figures — 28,000 jobs for Keystone XL and 12,000 for the Dakota Access pipeline. As for the steel, workers in Arkansas have already built about half of the high-strength line pipe needed for the project, some 333,000 tons.
